name: RobotController
0:
”Alexa, open robot controller”
”Alexa, ask robot controller to move forward”
”Alexa, ask robot controller can you dance”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: robot controller
des:
This skill can let Yanshee robot move, setup Yanshee robot's volume, dance etc.
If you have a Yanshee robot, you can use robot controller skill to control robot. If not, you can use this skill just for fun.

example: 
User: "Alexa, open robot controller"
Skill: "Hi, Welcome to use robot controller skill."
User: "move forward"
Skill: "Okay, another command?"
User: "can you dance?"
Skill: "Okay, another command?"
User: "No" or "Cancel"
Skill: "Okay, Bye-bye." and exit skill.

all commands: 
"go", "well done", "kick left foot", "kick right foot", "left hit", "push up", "right hit", "shoot", "shoot left", "shoot right", "stop action", "go backward", "can you dance", "stop dance", "go forward","stop moving", "turn left", "turn right", "Turn the speaker down", "Turn the speaker up", "speak loud", "speak softly"

Any problem, please contact our developer E-mail: swenggroup@ubtechedu.com.
